Package burlap.shell.command.env

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddRelationCommand
    A ShellCommand for adding a relational target to an attribute for the current Environment State.
    AddStateObjectCommand
    A ShellCommand for adding an OO-MDP object to the current Environment State.
    EpisodeRecordingCommands
    Two ShellCommands, rec and episode, for recording and browsing episodes of behavior that take place in the Environment.
    ExecuteActionCommand
    A ShellCommand for executing an action in the Environment Use the -h option for help information.
    IsTerminalCommand
    A ShellCommand for checking if the Environment is in a terminal state.
    ObservationCommand
    A ShellCommand printing the current observation in the Environment Use the -h option for help information.
    RemoveRelationCommand
    A ShellCommand for removing a relational target from an attribute for the current Environment State.
    RemoveStateObjectCommand
    A ShellCommand for removing an OO-MDP object from the current Environment State.
    ResetEnvCommand
    A ShellCommand for resetting the Environment.
    RewardCommand
    A ShellCommand for checking the last reward received from the Environment.
    SetAttributeCommand
    A ShellCommand for setting attribute values for the current Environment State.
